A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I did not enjoy the movie\, I do not blame the actors\, but I blame Ryan Johnson for the film's quality. Disney chose a terrible screenwriter and director for this film. He changed the personality of the characters and divided the fan base. In an interview\, he said that he liked to create a movie that would divide the fan base\, which is a terrible idea to have when working on a beloved film such as Star Wars.
